mapper.select: select d.id, d.factory_code factoryCode, d.box_model boxModel, d.device_name deviceName, d.remark, f.factory_name factoryName from t_box_device_info d, t_box_factory_info f where d.factory_code = f.factory_code and d.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_box_device_info
id,
factory_code,
box_model,
device_name,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{factoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{boxModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_box_device_info
factory_code = #{factoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
box_model = #{boxModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
